5242.verse-arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَارَكَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ الْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
5242.verse-english: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -

clauses-english.clause: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion,
and He is over all things competent -

5243.verse-arabic: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفُورُ
5243.verse-english: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving -

clauses-english.clause: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed -
and He is the Exalted in Might,
the Forgiving -

5244.verse-arabic: الَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلْقِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ مِن تَفَاوُتٍ ۖ فَارْجِعِ الْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍ
5244.verse-english: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?

clauses-english.clause: [And] who created seven heavens in layers.
You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency.
So return [your] vision [to the sky];
do you see any breaks?

5245.verse-arabic: ثُمَّ ارْجِعِ الْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ الْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ
5245.verse-english: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.

clauses-english.clause: Then return [your] vision twice again.
[Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.

5246.verse-arabic: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِمَصَابِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَاهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَاطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ السَّعِيرِ
5246.verse-english: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.

clauses-arabic.clause: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِمَصَابِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَاهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَاطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ السَّعِيرِ

clauses-english.clause: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.

5247.verse-arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيرُ
5247.verse-english: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.

clauses-english.clause: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell,
and wretched is the destination.

5248.verse-arabic: إِذَا أُلْقُوا فِيهَا سَمِعُوا لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ
5248.verse-english: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.

clauses-english.clause: When they are thrown into it,
they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.

5249.verse-arabic: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ الْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَا أُلْقِيَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَا أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ
5249.verse-english: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner?"

clauses-english.clause: It almost bursts with rage.
Every time a company is thrown into it,
its keepers ask them,
"Did there not come to you a warner?

5250.verse-arabic: قَالُوا بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَاءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ اللَّهُ مِن شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ كَبِيرٍ
5250.verse-english: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.'"

clauses-english.clause: They will say,
" Yes,
a warner had come to us,
but we denied and said,
'God has not sent down anything.
You are not but in great error.

5251.verse-arabic: وَقَالُوا لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِي أَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ
5251.verse-english: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."

clauses-english.clause: And they will say,
"If only we had been listening or reasoning,
we would not be among the companions of the Blaze.

5252.verse-english: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.

clauses-english.clause: And they will admit their sin,
so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.

5253.verse-arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِالْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
5253.verse-english: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.

clauses-english.clause: Indeed,
those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.

5254.verse-arabic: وَأَسِرُّوا قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ اجْهَرُوا بِهِ ۖ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
5254.verse-english: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

clauses-english.clause: And conceal your speech or publicize it;
indeed,
He is Knowing of that within the breasts.

5255.verse-arabic: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ اللَّطِيفُ الْخَبِيرُ
5255.verse-english: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?

clauses-english.clause: Does He who created not know,
while He is the Subtle,
the Acquainted?

5256.verse-arabic: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَامْشُوا فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا مِن رِّزْقِهِ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
5256.verse-english: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection.

clauses-english.clause: It is He who made the earth tame for you -
so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision -
and to Him is the resurrection.

5257.verse-arabic: أَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي السَّمَاءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ الْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ
5257.verse-english: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?

clauses-arabic.clause: أَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي السَّمَاءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ الْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ

clauses-english.clause: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?

5258.verse-arabic: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي السَّمَاءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
5258.verse-english: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.

clauses-english.clause: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones?
Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.

5259.verse-arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
5259.verse-english: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.

clauses-english.clause: And already had those before them denied,
and how [terrible] was My reproach.

5260.verse-arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا إِلَى الطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَافَّاتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا الرَّحْمَٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ بَصِيرٌ
5260.verse-english: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing.

clauses-english.clause: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in?
None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful.
Indeed He is,
of all things,
Seeing.

5261.verse-arabic: أَمَّنْ هَٰذَا الَّذِي هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ ۚ إِنِ الْكَافِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ
5261.verse-english: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion.

clauses-english.clause: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful?
The disbelievers are not but in delusion.

5262.verse-arabic: أَمَّنْ هَٰذَا الَّذِي يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا فِي عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
5262.verse-english: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.

clauses-english.clause: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision?
But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.

5263.verse-arabic: أَفَمَن يَمْشِي مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِ أَهْدَىٰ أَمَّن يَمْشِي سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
5263.verse-english: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?

clauses-arabic.clause: أَفَمَن يَمْشِي مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِ أَهْدَىٰ أَمَّن يَمْشِي سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

clauses-english.clause: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?

5264.verse-arabic: قُلْ هُوَ الَّذِي أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ السَّمْعَ وَالْأَبْصَارَ وَالْأَفْئِدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
5264.verse-english: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful."

clauses-english.clause: Say,
"It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts;
little are you grateful.

5265.verse-arabic: قُلْ هُوَ الَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
5265.verse-english: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."

clauses-english.clause: Say,
"It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth,
and to Him you will be gathered.

5266.verse-arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
5266.verse-english: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"

clauses-english.clause: And they say,
"When is this promise,
if you should be truthful?

5267.verse-arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَا الْعِلْمُ عِندَ اللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَا أَنَا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
5267.verse-english: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."

clauses-english.clause: Say,
"The knowledge is only with God,
and I am only a clear warner.

5268.verse-arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيئَتْ وُجُوهُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تَدَّعُونَ
5268.verse-english: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call."

clauses-english.clause: But when they see it approaching,
the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed,
and it will be said,
"This is that for which you used to call.

5269.verse-arabic: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِيَ اللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِيَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ الْكَافِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
5269.verse-english: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?"

clauses-english.clause: Say,
[O Muhammad],
"Have you considered:
whether God should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us,
who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?

5270.verse-arabic: قُلْ هُوَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ آمَنَّا بِهِ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
5270.verse-english: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error."

clauses-english.clause: Say,
"He is the Most Merciful;
we have believed in Him,
and upon Him we have relied.
And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error.

5271.verse-arabic: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَاؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَاءٍ مَّعِينٍ
5271.verse-english: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"

clauses-english.clause: Say,
"Have you considered:
if your water was to become sunken [into the earth],
then who could bring you flowing water?
